Class Quadrilateral

  • java.lang.Object
    • Quadrilateral

  • public class Quadrilateral
extends java.lang.Object
    The class representing a Quadrilateral
    Version:
    25-August-2018
    Author:
    Aditya Lahiri,Akshat Mittal,Gargi Balasubramaniam,Ishaan Patel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] edge
      This array stores the edge lengths of the quadrilateral.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Quadrilateral(int edge)
      The constructor for class Quadrilateral,for creating a square.
      Quadrilateral(int length, int breadth)
      The constructor for class Quadrilateral,for creating a rectangle.
      Quadrilateral(int edge1, int edge2, int edge3, int edge4)
      The constructor for class Quadrilateral,for creating a general quadrilateral.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      This method compares this Quadrilateral object to another object.
      It compares the perimeters of two objects of Quadrilateral type.
      int getPerimeter()
      The method returns the perimeter of the quadrilateral, which can be calculated using array field edge.
      Note: This is an int calculation.
      int hashCode()
      Generates hashcode for this object.
      The edge array fieldedge of the Quadrilateral object is used for computation of hashcode.

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • edge

        private int[] edge
        This array stores the edge lengths of the quadrilateral.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Quadrilateral

        public Quadrilateral(int edge)
        The constructor for class Quadrilateral,for creating a square. The constructor takes one parameter edge and assigns these values to all 4 elements of the array edge field of class Quadrilateral.
        Parameters:
        edge - int value equal to edge of the square

      • Quadrilateral

        public Quadrilateral(int length,
                     int breadth)
        The constructor for class Quadrilateral,for creating a rectangle. The constructor takes two parameters, length and breadth and assigns these values to all 4 elements of the array edge field of class Quadrilateral. Store the length in first two elements of array edge and breadth in the next two elements.
        Parameters:
        length - int value equal to length of the rectangle
        breadth - int value equal to breadth of the rectangle

      • Quadrilateral

        public Quadrilateral(int edge1,
                     int edge2,
                     int edge3,
                     int edge4)
        The constructor for class Quadrilateral,for creating a general quadrilateral. The constructor takes four parameters: edge1,edge2,edge3 and edge4 and assigns these values to all 4 elements of the array edge field of class Quadrilateral.
        Parameters:
        edge1 - int value equal to 1st edge of the quadrilateral
        edge2 - int value equal to 2nd edge of the quadrilateral
        edge3 - int value equal to 3rd edge of the quadrilateral
        edge4 - int value equal to 4th edge of the quadrilateral

    • Method Detail

      • getPerimeter

        public int getPerimeter()
        The method returns the perimeter of the quadrilateral, which can be calculated using array field edge.
        Note: This is an int calculation. Do not use any other datatype.
        Returns:
        returns an int value which is perimeter of quadrilateral whose side lengths are equal to elements in field edge.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        This method compares this Quadrilateral object to another object.
        It compares the perimeters of two objects of Quadrilateral type. If both the perimeters are equal, the objects are deemed equal; otherwise not. Refer to the algorithm given in pre lab sheet.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The object that should be tested for equality with an instance of Quadrilateral class
        Returns:
        true if both objects are equal, else false.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Generates hashcode for this object.
        The edge array fieldedge of the Quadrilateral object is used for computation of hashcode. The hashcode is computed using the equation: 17*37 + edge.hashCode())
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Calculated Hashcode of the object using the edge array field.
